showScoreExcerpt:
"The second act is repetitious and unruly and stretches the evening out too far. While I have unlimited admiration for Audra McDonald, her glamour and melodious voice work against her playing the beat-down Frankie. Michael Shannon is very much in his element. I thought they captured the playâ€™s humor better than its pathos...Those who have not seen the play before will probably enjoy this production unless they are uncomfortable with nudity and rough language."
